content.rendered:
Introducing… Our New Location!

Our Northside Drive location has moved. Come visit us – we’re open!

Our New Address
2834 Riverside Drive
Macon, GA 31204

MAP IT!

 

Read It Before You See It!

Gottwals Books has several of this year’s books turned motion picture available at each location!

  • The Fault in Our Stars ($7.97)
  • Divergent ($5.97)
  • Allegiant ($10.97)

Your Summer Reading Headquarters

Summer means summer reading! Bring us your summer reading lists.We can help you check those books off your list for less!

Stay Tuned for Kid’s Corner

Our book reading event will be held at the Warner Robins and Macon locations this summer! More info to come.

Graduation Season Is Upon Us!

What book was most influential when you were graduating? Give the graduates in your life a gift that will guide them through this transition as it guided you!

Looking for a New Book? We Can Help with that Too!

We’re not JUST used books! You will often find brand-new discounted books on our shelves and we can often order new books for less than you’d pay elsewhere
(including online booksellers!)

HUGE Variety of Bibles

We currently have our largest inventory of Bibles EVER! Take your pick from all sorts of study Bibles and translations for your personal study or for a meaningful gift.

Looking for Obscure Titles?

Send your email requests via our online form and we will check our inventory for you!

View Book Request Form 

Melissa & Doug® Toys

Gottwals Books and Walls of Books carry a huge line of Melissa & Doug® toys and educational products. Visit our interactive kids sections and play with the puzzles, wooden trains, and blocks! With high quality and great pricing, Melissa & Doug® products make wonderful gifts.

Toy of the Week:

Broom/Mop Set
$29.97

This six-piece play set gives kids all the housekeeping tools they need to keep it clean! Sized just for kids and built to last, the broom, mop, duster, dust pan, and hand brush are comfortable to use and easy to store–just hang them from the sturdy cords onto the included stand for neat, compact storage.

(The dust pan can also snap onto any of the handles.) Natural-wood handles add durability and a classic look; bright pops of color keeps lots of fun in the mix!

excerpt.rendered: Our Northside Drive location has moved. Come visit us – we’re open! Read more to see pics and find out what else is happening this week at Gottwals Books.
